releases.title: 14 Untitled
releases.description_html: A brief series of docudramas // In 1949 a pack of wolves assembles along the newly formed East German border // Encapsulating short but expository states of being // Their ears perk as the winds start to rise // Oct. 2018 - Jan. 2019

releases.title: Llamada
releases.description_html:
//im trying to think//
  composed entirely

  think of it what you will

releases.title: Splotchy
releases.description_html:
production requires time and time brings discontentment.
the view is splotchy but the picture turned out alright.

releases.title: It Hurts

The first sonic collaboration within Bad Optics.
